column4: is there any program in the repos that works like the windows net program?
there is not one program like that. there are several more advanced tools though
no, the net command, it communicate over netbios/msrpc/msds not sure
yes. like I said there is not a program that works the same way but there are several more advanced tools
it doesn't matter if it is more capable :p
what do you need to do in particular?
is there nothing with full support for what them typical windows port does?
what do you want to do? you can mount shares and so. do you want to control windows remotely or what?
you'll have to look for alternatives
which was my question. is there such an alternative
not one that works the same way
